explains: n. 骑摩托车的人；骑自行车的人

sentences.en: I'm madly in love with this hot biker chick.
sentences.cn: 我疯狂地爱上了这个迷人的骑摩托车的妞。

sentences.en: Jill was a knockout with her biker leathers and t-shirt.
sentences.cn: 吉尔穿上她的摩托车皮衣和T恤衫非常引人注目。

sentences.en: The smart biker also wears boots, gauntlets, and protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 聪明的骑车人也穿上长靴、长手套和防护衣。
